name: Knight Training
description:
Training a Knight to be the best can be hard. Show off your skills by being among the best.

Controls： Mouse(left button) or Keyboard(left arrow and right arrow).

[HOW TO PLAY]
- Left-click in the direction you want the knight to hit. Or use the left arrow to hit the left and the right arrow to hit the right.
- Avoid the lasers.
- Increase your score to unlock new characters.

[FEATURES]
* Beautiful Graphics
* Epic Music
* Unlockables

Enjoy the game!
